nodes.text: So I take it you have fallen for Esme?
I'm not falling - I'm soaring! She's like the melody to my music and the rhythm to my heart beat.
I wrote this song about her -

Auburn hair and golden eyes
A look that brooks no compromise.
That sultry, sexy way she seems
She's a foxy female gonna haunt your dreams.

Ooh, ooh Rover lady - watch as she walks by
Ooh, ooh wolfy woman - she make you feel like you fly!
What do you think? Does it do her justice?
I think you have done a great job at describing Esme.

Esme has a side that's wild
She caught your heart when first she smiled...

You are painting her portrait in music and words.
You are painting her portrait in music and words.
(grin)
So after all this time, suddenly Esme is the woman of your dreams? What about Sophia? Moira? Katie? Face it, Aeolus - you have more crushes than a Minotaur in a candy factory.
So why all of a sudden are you in love with Esme now?
I was walking back to our room whistling a merry melody when suddenly Esme passed me by dancing to my tune. Her eyes sparkled in the torchlight and her body flowed like flame.
When we came to the end of the dance, I bowed to her.
She kissed me on my forehead and ran off giggling. It was like being kissed by an angel.
I know you see Esme every day. Tomorrow could you please talk to her about me and tell her how I feel?
Sure... I'll mention you to her when next I see her.
Thank you! I just want to make sure that Esme realizes that I'm crazy about her.

nodes.name: Talking to Esme about Aeolus
nodes.description: So now Aeolus has a crush on Esme and wants me to talk to her about him. I'll do my best, but this never seems to go well for Aeolus.

nodes.text: Oh, I'm sure that she already knows about the crazy part...

options.text: Tell Aeolus to Talk to Esme Himself

nodes.text: Sorry, Aeolus, but I try to make a point of not getting involved in other people's love affairs. You're the one who needs to talk to Esme. Nothing I can say will make a difference in how she feels about you.
Maybe not, but if you talked to her about me, she might realize that I'm not as dorky as I seem.
The only way Esme will learn that you aren't a dork is for you to show her how much you care. Sing her your song. Maybe she'll dance to it.
<sigh> I'll do that, I guess.
Oh no... I'm not going to get involved with your one-sided romances again.

options.text: Tell Aeolus that Shawn Loves Esme

nodes.text: Aeolus - I have to tell you that I'm in love with Esme. I've been trying to win her heart from the time we first met.
What? You've never said anything to me about Esme. You don't act like you are in love with anyone.
So... Have you spoken to Esme about your love or is this all in your head?

options.text: Tell Aeolus that Esme Loves Shawn

nodes.text: Esme loves me. We've been friends from the start.
But... I love her...
Still, you are my best friend, Shawn. I don't want to hurt you. Good luck with Esme.
I'm going to talk to Esme about this and see if she really is in love with you.

options.text: Tell Aeolus that Shawn is Courting Esme

nodes.text: I'm still working to win her heart. She likes me... that's a start.
I love Esme, but you are my best friend. I don't really want to come between you.
We'll see whether Esme likes you better than she likes me even with all your courting. She loves music. She and I belong together.
What? You told me you were in love with Katie!
Well.. I was... things just didn't work out between us.
I gave up on my dreams and let you have Katie all to yourself because I liked you. Now you say you are in love with the woman of my dreams! Some friend you are.
Hey, I tried to woo Katie. It's not my fault that things didn't work out.
Funny thing how you've been in love with Esme all this time... except for the time you were in love with Katie!
And you are telling me that I can't fall in love with more than one woman? What about your one and only Sophia? Or your true love for Moira?
They really didn't like me as much as I liked them.

options.text: Ask Aeolus to Clean Up the Room

nodes.text: It's nice to be able to get to look out the window without stepping on or over stuff in front of it. Why don't you clear up the stuff in front of the window so that we can look out sometime?
You want me to clean the debris so that you can see the sea? Si!
Would you do me a favor and clean up some of your junk? I feel like I'm haunted by the ghosts of yesterday's laundry.
I'd hate for my roommate to be shocked by dirty socks or undermined by my unmentionables. I'll try to comply.
You may be a great bard, but you are a terrible roommate. It's about time you cleaned up this mess. It's my room, too, and I'm tired of tripping on your junk all over the floor.
Okay, I'll try to get to it between classes tomorrow.
Get some sleep, why don't you?
I'll be dancing with Esme in my dreams...
